features: Ingredients: Witch Hazel Distillate, Purified Water, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside (vegetable based emulsifier), Decyl Glucoside, Sweet Orange essential oil, Spearmint essential oil, Tea Tree essential oil, Citric Acid,Sodium Benzoate

Product Care: Concentrate is 1:8 ratio (500ml concentrate = 4L mat cleaner; 125ml concentrate = 1L mat cleaner). Mix concentrate with (distilled) water to create mat cleaner formulation. Spray mat liberally, allow to sit for a few minutes then wipe. Allow mat to dry fully before rolling.
